actions.open_pool_dashboard_new_tab: Open pool dashboard in new tab

messages.restart_required: You must restart this device after saving for changes to take effect.
messages.block_found: Today is your lucky day! Your device has found a block ðŸŽ‰
messages.default_btc_address_warning_prefix: You are using the default factory Bitcoin address. Please change the
messages.default_btc_address_warning_suffix: field to your own Bitcoin address to receive mining rewards.
messages.release_check_notice_prefix: Please note, this will connect to
messages.release_check_notice_suffix: to check for the latest release.
messages.firmware_updated: Firmware updated. Device has been successfully restarted.
messages.axeos_updated_reload: AxeOS updated. The page will reload in a few seconds.
messages.frequency_low: Device frequency is set low - See settings
messages.fallback_pool: Using fallback pool - Share stats reset. Check Pool Settings and / or reboot Device.
messages.version_mismatch: Firmware ({fw}) and AxeOS ({axeos}) versions do not match. Please make sure to update both www.bin and esp-miner.bin.

errors.pool_change_failed: Error during pool change or device restart: {error}
errors.device_unreachable_for: Unable to reach the device for {duration}
errors.pool_save_failed_for: Could not save pool settings for {uri}. {error}
errors.invalid_certificate: Please enter a valid SSL/TLS certificate

network.title: Network Configuration
network.hostname_help: Name of the device on your local network

pool.title: Pool Configuration
pool.suggested_difficulty_help: Used to indicate a preference for share difficulty to the pool. Servers are not required to honour this request, even if they support the stratum method. (0 to disable)
pool.extranonce_subscribe_help: Indicates to the server that the client supports the mining.set_extranonce method. Required by some pools, check the pool documentation.
pool.certificate_placeholder: Enter or choose a certificate file (.pem, .crt, .cer)

device.custom_settings_warning: Custom settings can cause damage and system instability. Only change these settings if you understand the risks of running outside designed parameters.
device.overheat_reset_hint: Reset Frequency and Voltage before clicking this button.
device.overclock_reset_tooltip: Return to safe preset values only

miner.pool_response_time_help: Time it takes for the pool to respond to a share

rejection_explanations.invalid_nonce2_length: The nonce2 value does not match the expected length for this mining job.
rejection_explanations.worker_mismatch: The worker name sent does not match the expected or authenticated worker.
rejection_explanations.no_nonce: The share submission was missing a nonce value.
rejection_explanations.no_ntime: The submission was missing the network time (ntime).
rejection_explanations.no_nonce2: The submission did not include the nonce2 value.
rejection_explanations.no_job_id: The submission did not specify a job ID.
rejection_explanations.no_username: The submission was missing a username (worker name).
rejection_explanations.invalid_array_size: The JSON array parameters had an unexpected size.
rejection_explanations.params_not_array: The parameters field was not formatted as a JSON array.
rejection_explanations.valid: This is not a rejection reason - it indicates a valid share.
rejection_explanations.invalid_job_id: The job ID in the submission was not recognized or is no longer valid.
rejection_explanations.stale: While this share was being submitted, the network had already found a new block, making this share invalid.
rejection_explanations.ntime_out_of_range: The provided ntime value was outside the allowed range.
rejection_explanations.duplicate: This share has already been submitted.
rejection_explanations.above_target: The submitted share does not meet the minimum required difficulty.
rejection_explanations.invalid_version_mask: The version mask provided was invalid for this job.
rejection_explanations.subscription_validation_error: The miner's subscription request was invalid or malformed.
rejection_explanations.configuration_validation_error: Invalid mining configuration or settings sent by the miner.
rejection_explanations.authorization_validation_error: The credentials provided by the miner were incorrect or not authorized.
rejection_explanations.suggest_difficulty_validation_error: An invalid difficulty value was suggested by the miner.
rejection_explanations.mining_submit_validation_error: The submitted mining work was invalid or improperly formatted.
rejection_explanations.job_not_found: While this share was being submitted, the network had already found a new block, making this share invalid.
rejection_explanations.duplicate_share: This share has already been submitted.
rejection_explanations.difficulty_too_low: The submitted share does not meet the minimum required difficulty.
